subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: As Brazil heads into the World Cup that begins in Germany on June 9, the biggest problem facing Coach Carlos Alberto Parreira is how to fit five of the world's most electrifying goal scorers into four slots.
snippet: As Brazil heads into the World Cup that begins in Germany on June 9, the biggest problem facing Coach Carlos Alberto Parreira is how to fit five of the world's most electrifying goal scorers into four slots.
